entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILC: redundant warnings for annotation mismatch on static DIM #104702
  • Misleading error message when trying to deserialize JSON into a collection property without a getter #104700
    Future
  • HTTP/3 Test Failure: SocketsHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest_Http3.SendAsync_ExpectedDiagnosticCancelledLogging #104699
    9.0.0
  • Remove lightup approach for newer [InterceptorAttribute] feature; need to know compiler version #104693
    9.0.0
  • Add `JsonElement.GetPropertyCount()` #104692
    10.0.0
  • X509Chain Gap on Linux #104690
    Future
  • [Linker][Tests] HttpClientTests fails with System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: The SSL connection could not be established #104682
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient ignores 413 error response #104678
  • Faulting module name: coreclr.dll, version: 6.0.3224.31407 #104675
  • Intermittent errors building CoreCLR on Windows ARM #104674
    9.0.0
  • GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950 test failure #104671
  • BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow times out #104670
  • [API Proposal]: Add TagList overload to ActivityEvent API #104667
  • JIT: Loop alignment does not kick in for a tight "sum" loop #104665
  • LoongArch64: Track the progress of nativeaot test cases passing on LoongArch64. #104661
    Future
  • JIT: Unnecessary prolog frame setup in .NET 9 #104658
  • for loop performance regression #104655
  • Make TimeProviderTaskExtensions WaitAsync run continuations synchronously like Delay #104654
    Future

Closed

  • Add JsonElement.ValueSpan #77666
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 23 Regressions on 6/22/2024 6:46:45 PM #103974
  • read mem.stat.hierarchical_memory_limit when looking for the memory limit #83563
    9.0.0
  • baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester fails on Linux #46175
    9.0.0
  • Unable to add a Certificate in ClientCertificates from HttpClientHandler/SocketsHttpHandler #78933
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator should move to GetInterceptableLocation API #101079
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] `H3_FRAME_ERROR` in Post Duplex Slow #102880
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Support copying arrays of compatible pointers #104197
    9.0.0
  • Do unloadability memory leak testing on a larger subset of the CoreCLR tests #11160
    Future
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_89834/test89834/test89834.cmd #104057
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Json has transitive dependency on vulnerable System.Text.Json #104669
    8.0.x
  • Can an application structure based on WPF and the Prism framework using IoC be compiled using AOT? #104660
  • System.Net.Dns.RunAsync() does not decrement telemetry for canceled requests #92045
    9.0.0
  • JIT does not eliminate bounds check with 64-bit indexed loop #104659
    10.0.0
  • Null check at runtime by default + optional disabling #104656
  • `FileSystemWatcher` does not work when there is more than 1 instance of it #98424
    Future
  • Runtime Crash (SIGSEGV) on iOS #98410
    9.0.0
  • 200kB size delta for minimal NativeAOT shared lib with reflection disabled mode #91518
    Future
  • Proposal: expose <IlcFoldIdenticalMethodBodies> as a supported option #88748
    Future
  • Add bucket size hints to histograms #104137
    9.0.0
  • Support x86 for NativeAOT #86573
    Future
  • Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() needs IL2026-like warning for Native AOT (and self contained) builds #94200
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics - API surface confusion for TagList / ActivityTagsCollection #104607
    Future
  • HttpStress, HTTP/3: content mismatch in POST Duplex Slow #76183
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] H3_FRAME_UNEXPECTED in stress tests #87559
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] `H3_REQUEST_INCOMPLETE` on Linux #99959
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] QuicException: Stream aborted by peer (258) in `(POST Duplex | PUT) Slow` #100534
    9.0.0
  • Add PublishAot flag gives package restore error using global.json #100929
  • Test failure: SslStream_RandomSizeWrites_OK #104650
    8.0.x
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Tests.UInt128Tests_GenericMath.TryReadLittleEndianUInt64Test` fails in CI #104613
    9.0.0
  • superpmi-replay failing with `Assertion failed 'emitCurIG != emitPrologIG'` #104570
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • ILLink: Fix order dependent logic for DAM on types #104701
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Ensure mono wasm jiterpreter handles v128_bitcast #104698
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Update SDK to preview 6 #104696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use ARM64 tools when building on ARM64 hosts #104695
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Fix a few memory leaks #104691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable (No)ClientCert_DefaultValue_ResumeSucceeds only on Ubuntu 18 ARM #104689
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Refine post-dominance check in strength reduction #104687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    needs-area-label
  • Update downlevel Versions.props #104685
    needs-area-label
  • [Wasi] switch to preview 2 #104683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • JIT: Prove some cases where strength reducing to GC pointers is ok #104679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.ToString for large decimal string #104676
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update feature switch doc for WinForms feature switches #104673
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Intrinsify ExchangeObject/CompareExchangeObject for value = null #104668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid an allocation in BigInteger.Parse("-2147483648") #104666
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, look for RhpThrowHwEx2 as well. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Add `JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8Value` #104595
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher (#103710)" #104688
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Use new [Interceptable] ctor for source gen #104180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Limit the size of OID supported by AsnDecoder/AsnReader #104645
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104499
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.8
  • [mono] Support copying arrays of compatible pointers #104611
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add TensorPrimitives.{Max/Min}MagnitudeNumber #104651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi] sdk22 path #104379
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Update SYSLIB0026 with new message #104609
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add SYSLIB0056 to list of diagnostics #104005
    needs-area-label
  • In Dns.RunAsync calls AfterResolution when canceled #104435
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Improve early returns for HashSet SubSet and SetEquals methods #102758
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add bucket bound hints to Networking histograms #104629
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Amend the nativeaot for LoongArch64. #104653
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add a fallback to filling buffers in DeserializeAsyncEnumerable. #104635
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `CallArg::m_tmpNum` #104429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for Sve.Scatter() #104555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [browser][MT] troubleshooting deadlocks 2 #104615
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update natvis to show VNs #104485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip switch recognition for handles #104634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow implicit byref args and return buffers from aliasing #104616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Account for mixed-enregistered locals when zeroing without block-init #104593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Use GetTempPath2 on Windows if available #104642
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Use `GetArrayDataReference` in `Vector*` #104532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Throw InvalidOperationException on RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer() for generic methods #104644
    area-System.Reflection, 9.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with Json #103985
    area-System.Data
  • Enable DiagnosticsTest for HTTP3 #104641
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `FloatingPointExponentialAccelerator` #104649
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Provide fix for #81093 - "Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM" #100056
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Make `ObjectFactory<T>` covariant #102553
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2492353 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • illumos: set default timezone info path #104533
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Fix frame boundary detection in SslStream #104606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104648
    area-System.Buffers
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Do more DSA parameter sanity checking up front #104646
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update PackageOverrides.txt #104638
    area-Setup
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Link native shared libraries with 16k page alignment #104577
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix various asserts that were found by Antigen #104625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix cancelability of DNS queries #104420
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Copy prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading
